Shaman

Description

The Shaman is a hero subclass for the Elf class in Remixed Dungeon. The Shaman specializes in using staves as both melee and ranged weapons, with unique mechanics that allow for efficient combat with staff weapons.

Stats and Abilities

* Primary Attribute: Magical combat with staves * Special Mechanic: Can use staves as melee weapons effectively * Wand Synergy: When wielding a staff, wand zaps can be used without losing charges * Staff Mastery: Improved effectiveness when using staff weapons

Class Requirements

* Requires: Elf class and reaching the appropriate level * Alternative name: Shaman Subclass

Gameplay Strategy

* The Shaman subclass works best with staff-based weapons since they can use them effectively in melee combat * The charge conservation on wands makes this subclass particularly effective for players who rely on wand usage * Synergizes well with items and mechanics that enhance staff or wand usage
